div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1769 Mesopotamia, 1914-1918 (681) Burial: c. 195-190 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 100 AR Alexander III: 2 lifetime and early post. tetradr. ( Amphipolis) 10 dr. ( Lampsacus 1, Aby- dus 1, Colophon 3, Miletus 1, Teos 1, Sardes 1, Salamis 1, unc. 1) 3 late post. tetradr. ( Myti- lene 1, Aspendus 1, unc. 1) Lysimachus: 21 lifetime tetradr. ( Amphi- polis 1, Pella 1, Lysimacheia 2 ANS 1944.100.77433, Lampsacus 9 ANS 1944.100.77520 ANS 1944.100.77456 ANS 1944.100.77506 ANS 1944.100.77499, Cius 1, Alexandreia Troas 1, Pergamum 1, Magnesia 1, unc. 4) 18 post. tetradr. ( Aenus 1 ANS 1944.100.81690, Lysimacheia 2, Byzantium 5 ANS 1944.100.81482, Calchedon 2, Cyzicus 1, Cius 4, unc. 3 ANS 1944.100.81585 ANS 1944.100.81667 ANS 1944.100.81579) Attalus I: 8 tetradr. Antiochus I: 8 tetradr. ( Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Antiochus II: 8 tetradr. ( Seleuceia ad Ti- grim 5, Antiocheia 2, Sardes 1) Interregnum 246-244 B.C.: 2 tetradr. (Apa- meia) Antiochus Hierax: 1 tetradr. ( Ilium) Seleucus III: 1 tetradr. ( Seleuceia ad Ti- grim) Antiochus III: 18 tetradr. ( Seleuceia ad Tigrim 1, Susa 1, Nisibis 3, An- tiocheia 6, Apameia 2, Tarsus 3, Soli 1, unc. 1) Disposition: London 39; New York 13; Glendining, Aug. 1, 1934, nos. 77-96 Allan, BMQ 1936, pp. 127-8, illus. Newell, ESM and WSM, indices of hoards, s. v. Mesopotamia (Noe 681) â€ Jenkins, ANSMN 13 (1967), pp. 41-55, illus. Also known as "Dunne's Hoard"
